src:
Ada Mie Godog, Tom Yam hingga Shabu-shabu Enak yang Bikin Laper
01 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Jakarta - Pencarian destinasi kuliner terenak masih berlanjut. Kali ini tim Bikin Laper, mencoba aneka mie godog, bakso, hidangan Thailand, hingga shabu-shabu sepuasnya.Petualangan makan enak yang digawangi Ncess Nabati dan Dimas Beck terus berlanjut. Lewat acara Bikin Laper yang tayang di Trans TV setiap Senin - Jumat, pukul 18.00-19.00, penonton akan dimanjakan dengan berbagai rekomendasi makanan yang enak.Baca Juga: Sop Sumsum dan Nasi Kulit yang Nikmatnya Bikin Laper


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Di episode terbaru Bikin Laper yang akan tayang di Trans TV sore ini, Ncess dan Dimas jalan-jalan ke Kelapa Gading, Jakarta Utara, untuk mencoba mie godog khas Jawa di restoran Mie Godog Jawa & MIe Tek-Tek Kawan Lama.Di sana mereka dimanjakan dengan sensasi enak dari sepiring mie godog gaya Jawa, dan mie tek-tek gurih yang bikin laper. Mereka mencicipi mie godog Jawa, nasi goreng pete, hingga kwetiaw goreng gila yang gurih mulur.


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Puas jajan mie godog, Ncess dan Dimas lanjut icip-icip makanan enak di restoran Krua Thai, yang terletak di Jalan Boulevard Raya, Kelapa Gading. Pilihan mereka menyantap Kao Pad Sapparot, yaitu nasi goreng pakai nanas. Ada juga menu Choo Chee Pla, atau ikan goreng kari, hingga Tom Yam segar.Tak hanya tiga menu, Ncess dan Dimas dibuat kewalahan dengan banyaknya hidangan khas Thailand autentik di atas meja mereka. Kira-kira makanan khas Thailand apalagi ya yang mereka cicip di sana?Puas kalap makan khas Thailand, Ncess dan Dimas melipir ke Kebayoran Lama, untuk mencicipi bakso blenger dari Bakso BRI yang sudah hits sejak dulu. Duo makan ini menyantap bakso blenger, dan bakso mercen super pedas yang bikin mereka berdua tersengat rasa pedas super.


Foto: @bikinlapertranstv

Terakhir, petualangan kulineran seru di episode Bikin Laper sore ini ditutup dengan Ncess yang ditemani oleh Ajeng, menyantap hidangan shabu-shabu sepuasnya, di restoral All You Can Eat Momo Paradise di Senopati.Di Momo Paradise, Ncess dan Ajeng dibuai oleh empuknya daging Wagyu Chuck Eyeroll, Wagyu Brisket, hingga US Short Plate yang dicelupkan ke kuah kaldu sepuas mereka.


Foto: Istimewa

Pasti penasaran kan dengan keseruan Ncess dan kawan-kawan saat menghabiskan aneka makanan enak di atas? Jangan lupa tonton episode Bikin Laper yang tayang di Trans TV sore ini, pukul 18.00.Atau bisa juga intip akun Instagram @Bikinlapertranstv, yang berisi bocoran menu makanan dan restoran yang dituju, hingga foto-foto makanan yang menggugah selera.Baca Juga: Jajan Pempek, Bakso, hingga Prasmanan Khas Sunda yang Bikin Laper Simak Video "Bikin Laper Edisi Pedas Sambal 'Devil' Hingga Makanan Minang"[Gambas:Video 20detik](sob/odi)
text:
There are Godog Noodles, Tom Yam to Delicious Shabu-Shabu that Make Laper
01 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

Jakarta - The search for the most delicious culinary destinations still continues. This time the Bikin Laper team tried various kinds of godog noodles, meatballs, Thai dishes, to as much as crystal meth to the full. The adventure of delicious eating led by Ncess Nabati and Dimas Beck continued. Through the Make Laper program that airs on Trans TV every Monday - Friday, at 18:00 to 19:00, the audience will be spoiled with a variety of delicious food recommendations. Also Read: Marrow Soup and Skin Rice that Enjoys Making Laper


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

In the latest episode of Bikin Laper which will air on Trans TV this afternoon, Ncess and Dimas traveled to Kelapa Gading, North Jakarta, to try the Javanese godog noodles at the Mie Godog Jawa restaurant & MIe Tek-Tek Kawan Lama. There they were spoiled with a nice sensation from a plate of Javanese godog noodles, and savory tek-tek noodles that make me hungry. They tasted Javanese godog noodles, pete fried rice, to savory crazy fried kwetiaw.


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

Satisfied Godog noodle snacks, Ncess and Dimas continue tasting good food at the Krua Thai restaurant, located on Jalan Boulevard Raya, Kelapa Gading. Their choice is to eat Kao Pad Sapparot, which is fried rice with pineapple. There is also a menu of Choo Chee Pla, or fried fish curry, until Tom Yam is fresh. Not only three menus, Ncess and Dimas are overwhelmed with the many authentic Thai dishes on their table. Do you think about the typical Thai food, especially what they tasted there? Satisfied frantically eating typical Thai, Ncess and Dimas go to Kebayoran Lama, to taste the meatballs from the Meatballs BRI which has been hits long ago. This eating duo ate blenger meatballs, and super spicy mercen meatballs which made them both stung by super spicy flavors.


Photo: @bikinlapertranstv

Finally, an exciting culinary adventure in the episode Make a Laper this afternoon was closed with Ncess accompanied by Ajeng, eating as much shabu-shabu as you want, at the All You Can Eat Momo Paradise restoral in Senopati. In Momo Paradise, Ncess and Ajeng were lulled by the tender meat of Wagyu Chuck Eyeroll, Wagyu Brisket, to US Short Plate dipped in broth to their heart's content.


Photo: Special

Surely you are curious about the excitement of Ncess and friends while spending a variety of delicious foods above? Don't forget to watch the episode of Make a Laper that airs on Trans TV this afternoon, at 6:00 PM. Or you can also take a peek at Instagram account @Bikinlapertranstv, which contains leaked food and restaurant menus that are intended, to photos of food that are appetizing. Read Also: Snack Pempek , Meatballs, to the Typical Sundanese Buffet that Makes You Watch Video "Make Laper Spicy Edition of 'Devil' Sambal To Minang Food" [Gambas: Video 20seconds] (sob / odi)
